pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inequality Joint Decomposition // Computes and decomposes Gini, Bonferroni and Zenga 2007 point and synthetic concentration indexes. Decompositions are intended: by sources, by subpopulations and by sources and subpopulations jointly. References, Zenga M. M.(2007) doi:10.1400/209575 Zenga M. (2015) doi:10.1400/246627 Zenga M., Valli I. (2017) doi:10.26350/999999_000005 Zenga M., Valli I. (2018) doi:10.26350/999999_000011.
